column5: beloved husband of eva (nee gyorfi) and formerly louise russell (nee laskowski); father of lauren russell
column6: thomas russell jr. (jillian) and lyssa russell (ryan ward); grandfather of grace; brother of william russell (leslie) and james russell. private family services were held. memorials to the cleveland chapter of aspca. arrangements by berry-martens funeral home. www. berry. mcgreevey. comsend sympathy card print name location email personal message hide emailenter personal message here too difficult to read? reload. type the text in order submit guest book entry .
